subject: Re: My mistruths...
author: babiarz3
full_text:
Absolutely Kristin. As I said, my purpose was to clear up any
misconceptions about my honesty. I think anyone would have done the
same. Although I think it's funny that the truth gets a "can we drop
it now?" comment. I don't require or desire any apologies or any
replies to my post. I know that it will be read and knowing that
maybe, just maybe, someone will stop and consider the truth is enough
for me. After all, we are nothing if not honest.
Have a great day everyone and get back to work!
